verses.verse: וַיָּשֶׂם֩ <S%H7760><s%> laid הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king [אֲחַשֵׁרֹשׁ כ] (אֲחַשְׁוֵרֹ֧ושׁ <S%H325><s%> Ahasuerus ק) מַ֛ס <S%H4522><s%> a tribute עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the land וְאִיֵּ֥י <S%H339><s%> and [upon] the isles הַיָּֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> of the sea

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all מַעֲשֵׂ֤ה <S%H4639><s%> And all the acts תָקְפּוֹ֙ <S%H8633><s%> of his power וּגְב֣וּרָת֔וֹ <S%H1369><s%> and of his might וּפָרָשַׁת֙ <S%H6575><s%> and the declaration גְּדֻלַּ֣ת <S%H1420><s%> of the greatness מָרְדֳּכַ֔י <S%H4782><s%> of Mordecai אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> to which גִּדְּל֖וֹ <S%H1431><s%> advanced הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> whereunto the king הֲלוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הֵ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> like כְּתוּבִ֗ים <S%H3789><s%> him [are] they not written עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in סֵ֙פֶר֙ <S%H5612><s%> in the book דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> act הַיָּמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> age לְמַלְכֵ֖י <S%H4428><s%> of the kings מָדַ֥י <S%H4074><s%> of Media וּפָרָֽס׃ <S%H6539><s%> Persia

כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> For מָרְדֳּכַ֣י <S%H4782><s%> For Mordecai הַיְּהוּדִ֗י <S%H3064><s%> the Jew מִשְׁנֶה֙ <S%H4932><s%> [was] next לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto king אֲחַשְׁוֵר֔וֹשׁ <S%H325><s%> Ahasuerus וְגָדוֹל֙ <S%H1419><s%> and great לַיְּהוּדִ֔ים <S%H3064><s%> among the Jews וְרָצ֖וּי <S%H7521><s%> and accepted לְרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> of the multitude אֶחָ֑יו <S%H251><s%> of his brethren דֹּרֵ֥שׁ <S%H1875><s%> seeking טוֹב֙ <S%H2896><s%> the wealth לְעַמּ֔וֹ <S%H5971><s%> of his people וְדֹבֵ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> and speaking שָׁל֖וֹם <S%H7965><s%> peace לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of his whole זַרְעֽוֹ׃ <S%H2233><s%> to all his seed
